description:

title: BRAND NEW LISTING: 3/2.5/2 PLUS, on FOUR LOTS!
description:
philadelphia  living at its finest! Immaculate 3/2.5/2 plus POOL, TWO HEATED SPAS (one attached under screen and one stand-alone under panel roof), and ADDITIONAL detached 1-car garage/workshop all on nearly ONE FULL ACRE (four full lots, partially fenced) centrally located in Port Charlotte! Mature landscaping with underground irrigation surrounds this large SPLIT-BEDROOM home with a separate 24' x 16' outbuilding located on a fourth lot (367 Northview St) behind the three-lot row on Kensington (360 and 368 Kensington). With ample space on the extended driveway, on the vacant lot, or behind the double gate at the attached two-car garage to park your boat, toy hauler, or RV, this must-see home has it all. The primary residence has been joined with the lot to the left, and both are completely fenced with 6' vinyl privacy fencing (2016 and 2017). with an enclosed chain-link fence to separate the two areas if needed. As you enter the home through the screened front porch, elevated beamed ceilings extend the large formal living and dining area while a separate family room, both with triple-pocket sliders, surround the modern kitchen featuring granite counters, wood cabinets, and stainless appliances. A breakfast bar and additional dining nook combine the kitchen to the great room, providing ample space for seating and entertaining. A pass-through kitchen window gives access to the incredible outdoor living space and show-stopping lanai with huge paver deck, a large pool, a heated overflow spa, as well as a separate hot tub under the large cover of the insulated panel roof. An additional outdoor paver patio, perfect for grilling, leads to a 12'x10' shed behind the house for even more storage. Back inside this split-bedroom floorplan, you'll find two large bedrooms and a full guest bath to the left, as well as a spacious laundry room with washer, dryer, additional half-bath, utility sink, and the second of two access points to the garage. On the right of the home, a large master bedroom features his and hers walk-in closets in an en suite bath behind pocket door, as well as slider access to lanai/pool/spa. HVAC 12/29/2017, driveway extended 2017, whole house re-pipe in 2010, pool and spa plus pavers and cage in 2005. With the three separate properties totaling 40,000 square feet of land, let your imagination run wild! No flood zone, no HOA, no CDD! Well-loved and meticulously maintained, come see what Florida living is all about!

title: BEAUTIFUL NEWLY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM 1.5 BATH CORNER UNIT!!!
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
We are open for viewing Monday through Friday 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.
Please give us a call to schedule an appointment. Applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75. This covers up to two applicants.
Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
2. Proof of your monthly income such as, pay stubs, SSI/SSDI award
letter or statement of pension payments. We do not accept bank
statements as proof of income. We must be able to verify your income.
3. A copy of your social security card and ID as proof of your identity.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have any kind of arrest record.
Your income needs to be two and a half times
the cost of the rent.
**You will need to make your own copies**
Once you are approved for residency, you will need to pay one month's
security to hold the apartment. An apartment takes about three to five
weeks to make ready to move in. Once the apartment is ready, we
require an additional two months of rent: first and last month's rent.
ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS FOR $1100 PER MONTH *(Available 8/1)*
TWO BEDROOM APARTMENTS $1300 PER MONTH *(N/A)*
TWO BEDROOM 1.5 BA CORNER UNIT $1400 PER MONTH *(Available now)*
-Price of rent includes gas and water. (heating, cooking and hot water included)
-$25 monthly pet fee (Cats and small dogs)

title: Renovated Town House. Brand New Kitchen and Bath. Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Not showing till after July 15
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Beautiful and spacious 3 bedroom 1 bath townhouse
description:
This hidden gem is a bi-level unit located in one of the West Philly Love Letter Mural homes. Renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment. The unit features central air and heating system, stainless steel appliances, and stylish kitchen finishes. Two bedrooms are large enough for king sized beds, and the third comfortably fits a queen. The living area is very spacious and includes a separate dining area and a space off the living room for a bar. The unit also has a beautiful juliette balcony that lets in natural light and fresh air.
In the heart of West Philly on Market Street, conveniently located across the street from CVS and 2 blocks from CHOPs Primary Care Center, a grocery store and 3 blocks from the Market-Frankfort Train stop. 15 minute walk to bars and restaurants like Bookers and Dock Street Brewery and a 10 minute bike ride to Penn/Drexel.

title: New fitness center, Smoke-free apartments available, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
